title: Human Genetics
description: Introduction to the genetics and evolution of complex human traits, focusing on contemporary approaches to understanding susceptibility to malignant, metabolic, immune and psychological diseases.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: BIOL 2344 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOL 2354 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOS 2600 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOS 2610 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
